title: Data Scientist’s Handbook: Mastering Inferential Statistics
text:
Preface
Welcome to the preface of the Data Scientist’s Handbook: Mastering Inferential Statistics!
This handbook is a dedicated effort to instill a profound understanding of the pivotal role statistics plays in the world of data science. As we delve into the pages ahead, the intention is clear - to guide both current and prospective data scientists through a comprehensive learning experience.
Starting from the fundamentals and gradually progressing to advanced applications, this handbook is crafted to be an indispensable companion on your quest for statistical mastery.
I invite you to embrace the challenge and enrichment that comes with exploring inferential statistics, as we together pave the way for a deeper appreciation and utilization of statistical methods in the fascinating realm of data science.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.

text:
